review: I was impressed first of all by the way that the Fire TV Stick was packaged. It came in this really nice box. I have been very impressed with it. My mother-in-law enjoyed watching it while she was here with us. Today my husband was watching Fire Stick TV because he said that Netflix is a lot faster and that the picture is better than on our Wii system. I would recommend purchasing it. I paid $35 for it but it is normally $39. For that price (a one time purchase) it is very affordable and a great way to be able to watch TV.
author: Rachel
